analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x34d78533750fd0d75b313592d6d6ed7edf6367e0.sol:
	Contract CFSToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x34d78533750fd0d75b313592d6d6ed7edf6367e0.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/17/0x34d78533750fd0d75b313592d6d6ed7edf6367e0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/17/0x34d78533750fd0d75b313592d6d6ed7edf6367e0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x34d78533750fd0d75b313592d6d6ed7edf6367e0.sol#47) is not in mixedCase
